conversations.summary: Added AM Cash Count Viewer to FOH WATCHDOG tab with password protection. User can now view AM count data at any time of day.
key_decisions: Placed AM CASH tab between HISTORY and PASSWORDS in WATCHDOG
Displayed full drawer breakdown with denomination details
Used same format as PM flow AM summary
important_details: Function: loadAMCashData(date) - fetches and displays AM count
Shows counter name, timestamp, total, drawer details, notes
Committed: 2d9ecb4 - feat(foh): Add AM cash count viewer to WATCHDOG tab
